doc:
Gloria Foster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloria_Foster 0 Gloria Foster (November 15, 1933 – September 29, 2001) was an American actress, most known for her stage performances both on and off Broadway, including her acclaimed roles in plays In White America and Having Our Say, winning three Obie Awards during her career. In films, she was perhaps best known as the Oracle in The Matrix (1999) and The Matrix Reloaded (2003), the latter film being her last. Gloria Foster also played the role of the mother of Yusef Bell in the mini series The Atlanta Child Murders which aired in 1985. Gloria_Foster ( November_15_,_1933 – September_29_,_2001 ) was an_American_actress , most_known for her_stage_performances both on_and_off Broadway , including her_acclaimed_roles in plays In White_America and Having_Our_Say , winning three_Obie_Awards during her_career . In films , she was_perhaps_best_known as the_Oracle in The_Matrix_(_1999 ) and The_Matrix_Reloaded_(_2003_) , the_latter_film being her_last . Gloria_Foster also played the_role of the_mother of Yusef_Bell in the_mini_series The_Atlanta_Child_Murders which aired in 1985 .
